title: mkasmh.sh doesnt work with GNU Awk included in MSYS
body:
by **mizipzor**: 
Running ./mkasmh.sh in /c/go/src/pkg/runtime with GNU Awk 3.1.5, which is the 
version currently included with MSYS, gives the following output:

// Assembly constants.
// AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY mkasmh.sh DURING BUILD

#define	get_tls(r)	MOVL 0x2c(FS), r
#define	g(r)	0(r)
#define	m(r)	4(r)

Environment variables:
GOARCH = 386
GOOS = windows
